⬡ Pricing

Simple, transparent pricing

Start free. Grow on your terms. All plans include our core AI features — no hidden fees, no per-feature add-ons.

Pricing plans

Starter

$ 29 / month

For freelancers and solopreneurs who want clean, simple accounting.

  • Up to 100 transactions / month
  • AI categorization
  • 1 bank connection
  • Invoicing & payments
  • Basic reports
  • Email support
Start free trial
Most popular

Growth

$ 79 / month

For growing teams that need automation, collaboration, and deeper insights.

  • Unlimited transactions
  • Full AI bookkeeping suite
  • Unlimited bank connections
  • Smart invoicing & reminders
  • Expense management
  • Multi-user (up to 5 seats)
  • Tax package export
  • Priority support
Start free trial

Scale

Custom

For established businesses that need multi-entity, advanced controls, and dedicated support.

  • Everything in Growth
  • Multi-entity management
  • Consolidated reporting

All prices in USD. Annual billing saves 20%.

◎ FAQ

Common questions

Is there a free trial?
Yes — all plans include a 14-day free trial with full access to every feature. No credit card required to start.
Can I switch plans later?
Absolutely. You can upgrade or downgrade at any time. Upgrades take effect immediately; downgrades apply at the next billing cycle.
What payment methods do you accept?
We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, Amex) and ACH bank transfers for annual plans.
Is my data secure?
Yes. All data is encrypted in transit (TLS 1.3) and at rest (AES-256). We are SOC 2 Type II certified and undergo annual third-party audits.
Do you support multiple currencies?
Yes. Accountium supports 50+ currencies with automatic conversion at live exchange rates.
Can I import my existing data?
Yes. We support import from QuickBooks, Xero, Wave, and CSV/Excel. Our onboarding team will help you migrate at no extra cost.

Not sure which plan fits?

Talk to our team — we'll help you find the right plan for your team size and industry.
